text: Goodwins Corner is an unincorporated community in Center Township, Union County, in the U.S. state of Indiana. ==History== A post office was established at Goodwins Corner in 1871, and remained in operation until 1903. The community was named after the Goodwin family of settlers. ==Geography== Goodwins Corner is located at . ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Union County, Indiana Category:Unincorporated communities in Indiana
title: Goodwins Corner, Indiana
